title: Noah and the Animals
description: Simple questions about Noah's Ark for children

questions.text: Who told Noah to build the ark?

options.explanation: Genesis 6:13-14 tells us that God spoke to Noah and told him to make an ark.
Noah's wife did not tell him to build the ark. God gave this command to Noah.
The neighbors did not tell Noah to build the ark. They actually made fun of him for building it.

questions.text: How many of each animal did Noah take on the ark?

options.explanation: Genesis 7:2-3 tells us Noah took two of every sort into the ark, male and female.
Noah took two of each kind of animal, not just one.
Noah did not take ten of each animal. He took two of every kind.
